summary: Like the Bathing Beauties Luxury Suite, but wouldn\'t mind a more clever sounding name? These ESPs will alter the map marker to suit your tastes! Suggestions welcome!
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=6]Bathing Beauties Luxury Suite[/size]
[size=7]Map Marker Name Pack![/size][/center]

These ESP files will change the name of the Luxury suite map marker, giving you the feeling of having a different name for the Suite without changing any of the internal workings. Try to just use 1 of these at a time; whichever one comes last in load order will override all the ones before it. This is why I DON\'T recommend using Nexus Mod Manager. Just save this file somewhere and take out the esp you want to use and add it to your data folder manually.

I\'m open to suggestions! My only conditions are that they not be too vulgar. I don\'t wanna see \'P#$$y Shack\' in my comments section, ok? Yeah, I know its a \'bath house\' a.k.a. brothel, but, really? I don\'t want it too vulgar. Just gimme ideas with a bit of class and elegance. If I like them, I\'ll post cumulative updates regularly, as in, when I feel like it or get whined at hard enough. -_^

[size=5][color=00FF00]Names added in version 1.0:[/color][/size]

[size=4]-- Generic, gender-neutral[/size]
[list]
[*]The Luxury Suite
[*]The Luxury Suite and Bath House
[*]The Luxury Suite Bath, House and Dance Club
[*]Whiterun Bath House
[*]The Teddy Bear Club -- For users of Rip88’s Teddybears!
[/list]
[size=4]-- Dragon Names, It’s Skyrim, after all[/size]
[list]
[*]The Dragon\'s Harem
[*]The Dragonette\'s Stable
[*]The Dragon\'s Palace
[*]The Dragon\'s Sanctuary
[*]The Dragon\'s Castle
[/list]
[size=4]-- Aerdric Names, because sex is good![/size]
[list]
[*]The Bath House of Dibella
[*]The Dibellan Suite

[/list]

[*]Blood Baths

author: PlasmaJedi
